employees.name: Greg
employees.details: Really likes plaid, always has headphones on -- possibly a cyborg

employees.name: John
employees.details: Will tell you to not be an asshole

locations.name: Nashville North
locations.info: Our location in northern Nashville!  We've got lots of animals to adopt so come check us out

locations.name: Nashville South
locations.info: Our location in southern Nashville!  Our shelter is way nicer than those north guys.  All of our dogs eat biscuits for breakfast everyday

animals.name: Kiwi
animals.breed: Has more insta followers than you

owners.name: Andy
owners.about: Human give me attention meow snuggles up to shoulders or knees and purrs you to sleep so get suspicious of own shadow then go play with toilette paper see owner, run in terror destroy couch as revenge but carefully drink from water glass and then spill it everywhere and proceed to lick the puddle.
